title: Turbulence
description: Turbulence The past haunts her, but the future may kill her. Cynthia Reynolds, CEO of Zurtel, has one love in her lifeâ€”her career. At a young age, she learned the pain of romance. Now her father has hired Tristen Conners as a pilot, the very man who taught her that painful lesson. A sinister plot of industrial espionage to steal MX7, a new product that will revolutionize the aerospace industry, throws Cynthia and Tristen together in a deadly adventure.
author: Elaine Meece
